skillTree.localised_description: A master's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Capable of inspiring his Order to great deeds and accomplishments.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Never seen to be laughing or joking, the Knights of Morr approach every situation with the utmost severity.
When on duty, the Knights of Morr remain silent, except to deliver orders and battle calls.

skillTree.localised_description: Destruction of Chaos and Mutants, that is the mandate of the Knights Panther.

skillTree.localised_description: What deeds accomplished and enemies slain have earned this man the honored red and white?
To be placed in charge of a Banner is a great honor. It is a privilege to serve under this man.

skillTree.localised_description: For the chosen of Myrmidia, the Blazing Sun protects.
Employing advanced battlefield tactics and engaging in civilized warfare has earned this Grandmaster his patron god’s favor.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether a trick of the mind or a blessing from Ulric, the wind blows with an arctic chill when the wolves ride to battle.
Though wild and barbaric in appearance, they are the first Templar Order, and maintain strict discipline in battle.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 7% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 15% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A master of many wars, his men follow him to battle without question.
Any Knight from any order would be honored to serve with this Grandmaster.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light, Stubborn Bulls and Knights of the Black Rose units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light, Stubborn Bulls and Knights of the Black Rose units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light, Stubborn Bulls and Knights of the Black Rose units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light, Stubborn Bulls and Knights of the Black Rose units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."
